Index.title: Aha-Zhoubao Generator
Index.slogan: Struggling with writing weekly report? Let me help you!
Index.step1: Briefly describe your weekly report content
Index.placeholder: For example: Fixed the issue of client updating repeatedly, sorted out the design sprint for xxxx, responsible for following up on the development progress of the operating platform application market.
Index.privacyPolicy1: Do not upload overly private content. For more information, please refer to the
Index.prompt: Please help me turn the following job content into a complete weekly report in markdown format, presented in bullet points. Add some emoji expressions to the title if necessary: {description}
Index.notice: Due to the surge in traffic, the service may be unstable. You can bookmark this website and use it during idle times. Thank you for your overwhelming enthusiasm. This project has received much more attention than expected.
